entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Net 7 Kestrel windows service hangs after a period of time #46422
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #46421
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #46420
  • Switch Debian11 Amd64 helix queue to Debian12 once msquic is available #46418
    Infrastructure
  • Add $schema to launchSettings.json for all project templates #46416
  • Improve testing experience for identity #46415
  • Set up benchmarks for RequestDelegateGenerator and build times #46414
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Deeper nested WebApplicationFactory.WithWebHostBuilder instances aren't disposed correctly #46413
  • Files not found/ failed integrity check when deploying Hosted Blazor WASM app to IIS Express #46410
  • SignalR Redis Cluster scale-out: Message throughput scalability #46408

Closed

  • Improve missing database experience for SPA apps #37324
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add JwtBearerOptions to achieve Multi-Tanency in .NET 6 During Runtime #46281
    .NET 8 Planning
  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js:234 WebSocket connection error when running Blazor WASM project #46167
  • [Blazor WASM] An exception occurs while rendering multiple components that use IJSStreamReference #45799
  • Add asterisks for required input fields #45505
  • [AOT] Fix Blazor AOT warnings #45473
  • [AOT] Clean up AOT warnings in the SPA Proxy project #46036
    Backlog
  • Add support for `Finally`-like API to WebApplicationBuilder #45360
  • Disable named pipes transport on non-Windows platforms #46231
    8.0-preview2
  • `ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT` no longer overrides `DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT` #46325
  • Link generation incorrect, either ambient values ignored or incorrect url generated #44624
    Discussions
  • Recognize FromQuery.Name when generating URL #45285
    Discussions
  • Question: Does Blazor Identity work inside an iframe? #46017
    Discussions
  • CSS Isolation tags mismatch #45958

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce the IResettable type. #46426
  • Delete Interop.FunctionalTests.ChromeTests #46425
    area-runtime
  • Re-enable ChromeTests in Interop.FunctionalTests #46424
    area-runtime
  • Update Debian11 Arm64 queue to Debian12 #46419
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #46409
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add initial parameter support to RequestDelegateGenerator #46407
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Update Selenium to 4.8 and 109 #46423
    8.0-preview2
  • Fix casing in Api template #46329
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2103215 #46417
    8.0-preview2
  • Mark SPA Proxy as not for publication in SPA templates #46406
    8.0-preview2
  • Update references to System.IO.Pipelines #46360
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Restrict named pipes transport to be Windows only #46366
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2102131 #46391
    8.0-preview2
  • Removed unnecessary comma #46405
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
